lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee said the barred sprinter Justin Gatlin, whose four-year doping ban was recently upheld by the Court of Arbitration for Sport, was not eligible to compete in the Beijing Olympics regardless of a ruling by a federal court judge in Florida.
